PlantData.name: Rex Begonia
PlantData.water: Water every 4-7 days when top 1 inch of soil is dry. Keep soil moist but not soggy.
PlantData.light: Medium indirect sunlight or 8-10 hours under grow lights.

PlantData.name: Polka Dot Begonia
PlantData.water: Water twice a week and only if the top 1/2 inch of the soil is dry; never overwater this plant.
PlantData.light: Give the plant partial or indirect sunlight.

PlantData.name: Black Rabbit's Foot Fern
PlantData.water: Give plants ample water and mist the rhizomes daily if not grown in a humid room.
PlantData.light: No direct sunlight, dappled light or partial shade conditions.

PlantData.name: Flamingo Lily Anthurium
PlantData.water: Water only when top 5cm of soil/mix is dry.
PlantData.light: Good ambient light; avoid direct sun through glass; tolerates medium shade.

PlantData.name: Guiana Chestnut
PlantData.water: Let the top 2-4 inches of soil dry out in between waterings
PlantData.light: Bright and indirect light for 6-8 hours daily.

PlantData.name: Arrowhead Vine
PlantData.light: Keep the plant in bright but diffused light.

PlantData.name: Chinese Evergreen
PlantData.water: Water colorful aglaonema when the soil dries out.
PlantData.light: Grow colorful aglaonema in low, medium, or bright light.

PlantData.name: Pink Princess Philodendron
PlantData.water: Pot with plenty of drainage holes combined with regular waterings.
PlantData.light: Shade-loving, Don't let the sun's rays touch the foliage.

PlantData.name: ZZ Zanzibar Gem
PlantData.water: Let soil dry out completely in between waterings. A deep watering once every few weeks.

PlantData.name: Dragon Tree
PlantData.water: Water regularly during their growing season.

PlantData.name: English Ivy
PlantData.water: Evenly moist but not soggy soil.

PlantData.name: Lemon Button Fern
PlantData.water: Water your fern at least once a week to ensure that the soil stays consistently moist.

PlantData.name: Peace Lily
PlantData.water: Keep the soil consistently moist but not soggy.

PlantData.name: Bush on Fire Croton
PlantData.water: Keep the soil consistently moist but not soggy.
